Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Cicero
ShortDescription: Westbound 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster: due to, street blockage near Foster/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster: due to, street blockage near Foster/Cicero.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express and #100 Jeffery Manor Express Temporary Reroute near 106th/Buffalo
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express and 100 Jeffery Manor Express buses temporarily rerouted in both directions near 106th/Buffalo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#26 South Shore Express and #100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 106th/Buffalo due to, a raised bridge near 106th/Buffalo.

Southbound #26 South Shore Express buses will operate via Ewing, 100th, Commercial, 104th, Torrence and over regular route.

#100 Jeffery Manor Express buses will operate via Torrence, 104th, Commercial, 100th, Ewing, 106th and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red  Line Service Delayed at Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Bryn Mawr due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Bryn Mawr due to police activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
